firstScreen.heading: 당신의 영향력에서 수익을 올리세요.
firstScreen.USAResidentsCannotParticipate: 미국 시민권 자 및 거주자는 참가할 수 없습니다.

first.title: 소셜 미디어 블로거와 광고주를 연결하는 최초의 탈중앙화 시장
first.description: 영향을 미치는 주요 마케팅 문제 해결 SocialMedia.Market은 콘텐츠의 수익 창출, 커뮤니티 참여 및 구독자에 대한 노출을 위한 새로운 기회를 창조합니다. 블록 체인 기술과 소셜 미디어 토큰에 의해 추진되는 새로운 에코 시스템은 비즈니스와 영향력 간의 마케팅의 상호 작용을 단순화 합니다.

second.title: 영향력 마케팅은 브랜드를 위한 가장 효율적이고 전략적인 방법입니다
second.description: 조사에 따르면 소비자의 92%가 영향력 마케팅을 사용하여 광고를 게재하는 것을 신뢰하고 그 수가 많아지고 있습니다. 또한 유료 광고보다 비용 효율적이고 믿을 수 있는 브랜드의 추천으로 이어집니다. 이러한 이유로 영향력 마케팅은 아마도 가장 효과적이고 장기적인 마케팅 전략이 되었습니다.

videos.sectionTitle: 우리에 대한 훌륭한 비디오를 확인해 보세요

videos.title: Keith Teare, co-founder of Techcrunch about SocialMedia.Market
videos.desc: Influencer advertising market has a huge potential, which is halted by the issues it has yet to overcome. Nevertheless, the blockchain technology provides all the means to deal with fraud, transparency, and pricing problems in influencer advertising campaigns. That’s why SocialMedia.Market utilizes the technology to connect advertisers and publishers in a new influencer marketing ecosystem. I have always focused on the point at which change is happening. That’s why we are together in this with the SocialMedia.Market team.

videos.desc: A case for Influencer Marketing on the blockchain with a specific look at a project called Social Media Market.

videos.title: ICO Talk TV | "SOCIALMEDIA.MARKET" interview with Dmitry Shyshov
videos.desc: SocialMedia.Market will create a global marketplace for Advertisers and Influencers among every major social network, providing convenient and transparent tools for the interaction of any party involved. For maintaining commercial relationships between participants, SocialMedia.Market will use Blockchain technology to simplify integration, reduce fraud and costs for all market participants. Token value is going to be upheld not only by transaction means within platform services, but also supported with the ability to participate in the decentralized dispute solution system gaining additional earnings for token holders. Project: SOCIALMEDIA.MARKET

ЮТУБЕР | ДЕВОЧКА ИЗ "ЛАЙК ТВ ШОУ" ОБОГНАЛА PewDiePie ПО ПОДПИСЧИКАМ
videos.desc: Когда я сел писать сценарий к этому видео, на канале Алины “ЛайкТВ шоу” было уже 400 тысяч подписчиков. Кто-то радуется за внезапный успех ребенка, кто-то недоумевает, считает, что она не заслужила эту аудиторию. Груз ответственности на ее плечи только упал, поэтому время покажет, сможет ли она справиться. А пока, я же предлагаю проанализировать, какие фундаментальные изменения произошли за последние 7 дней у неё. Потому что я уверен, это была самая насыщенная на события неделя в ее жизни.

videos.cardTitle: The first blockchain based on influancer marketing?

expertsList.name: Chafik Abdellaoui
expertsList.status: 기업가, ACBMC, Bizzant, XEDYAS IT HYBRID SOLUTIONS의 창업자
expertsList.description: 영향력있는 마케팅은 브랜드가 광범위한 고객에게 메시지를 전달할 수있는 커다란 기회를 제공합니다. 블록 체인 (blockchain) 기술은 시장 개척을위한 규제 수단을 제공하여 관련자 모두에게 투명성과 보안을 보장합니다.

expertsList.name: David Meerman Scott
expertsList.status: 베스트셀러인 The New Rules of Marketing and PR의 저자
expertsList.description: 블록체인 기술은 사회적 영향력들과 협력하는 브랜드에 마지막으로 투명성을 가져올 것을 약속하고 있습니다.

expertsList.name: Werner Geyser
expertsList.description: 영향력있는 마케팅은 브랜드가 다양한 사용자에게 메시지를 전하는 큰 기회를 제공합니다. SocialMeida.Market은 블록 체인 기술의 도움으로 이 떠오르는 시장에 규격을 제공하고 관련된 모든 사람에게 투명성과 보안을 보장합니다.

expertsList.name: Peter Zhalov
expertsList.status: Wargaming.net의 전 마케팅 & 광고 부서 부회장
expertsList.description: 오늘날의 소비자는 애드블록을 사용하여 기존의 디지털 광고를 무시하고 있습니다. 영향력과 이스포츠 마케팅 업계에는 밀레니얼과 새로운 시대 사용자에게 접근하기 위한 더 효과적인 방법이 있습니다. 우리가 필요로하는 것은 영향력 마케팅을 위한 투명한 시장을 창조하는 것입니다.

expertsList.name: Alex Yastremski
expertsList.description: 이 프로젝트는 시장 참가자의 가치를 높이고, 마케터의 매출을 극대화 할 수 있는 야심 찬 목표로 저를 감동 시켰습니다. 팀의 전문성과 함께 이 프로젝트는 디지털 광고의 성공과 효과적인 올인원 솔루션이 될 수 있습니다.

expertsList.name: Slavik Nenaydokh
expertsList.description: SocialMedia.Market은 소셜 마케팅의 변화를 만들기 위한 노하우를 현명하게 활용하고 있습니다. 나는 SocialMedia.Market 팀의 비전에 참여하는 것을 바라고 있습니다. 나는 기업의 성숙 단계를 따라 걸어 나갈 것을 기대하고 있습니다.

ourTeam.sectionDesc: 현재 31명의 회원들이 프로젝트에 참여하고 있으며, 마케팅 전문가, 블록 체인 엔지니어, 개발팀을 늘리고 있습니다. 향후 4 개월 동안 SocialMedia.Market 팀을 70 명 늘릴 예정입니다.

teamList.name:
Dmitry
Shyshov
teamList.description: 기업가, CEO, 이스포츠 업계에서 성공한 두 가지 제품의 설립자. SocialMedia.Market의 비전을 제공. 2012년 Bitcoin을 처음 샀습니다.

Maksym
Churkin
teamList.description: 8 년 이상의 개발 경험을 가진 숙련 된 전문가. 최상의 결과를 얻기 위한 모범 사례와 최상의 프레임 워크를 항상 선택합니다.

Viktor

teamList.description: 전략 프로젝트의 성장을 위해 노력하고 있습니다. SocialMedia.Market을 전진시키는 사람.

Yehor
Shyshov
teamList.description: 컴퓨터 게임과 이스포츠 업계에서 일해온 경험 많은 사업 개발 매니저

teamList.name:
Evgeniy

howItWorks.sectionDescription: SocialMedia.Market은 모든 주요 소셜 네트워크 사이에서 광고주와 영향력을 위한 글로벌 시장을 만들고 관계자의 교류를 위한 편리하고 투명한 도구를 제공합니다. 참가자 간의 거래 관계를 유지하기 위해 SocialMedia.Market은 블록 체인 기술을 사용하여 통합을 간소화하고 모든 시장 참가자의 부정과 비용을 줄일 수 있습니다.
howItWorks.descriptionLeft: 콘텐츠 수익화, 모든 종류의 영향력 마케팅에 대한 낮은 장벽
howItWorks.descriptionRight: 전세계 광고주에 무제한 액세스 할 수 있습니다

tokenFunctionality.sectionDescription: SocialMedia.Market의 핵심 기능은 소셜 미디어 토큰 (SMT) 유틸리티 토큰에 의해 유지됩니다. 각 플랫폼의 활동은 거래를 보장하기 위해 SMT를 필요로 합니다.

roadmap.sectionDescription: SocialMedia.Market 로드맵은 기술, 운용 인프라, 새로운 파트너십 마케팅 이니셔티브의 개발에 중점을 두고 있습니다.

useOfFunds.sectionDescription: 플랫폼을 통해 조달 된 자금은 모든 참가자가 사용할 수 있는 모든 SocialMedia.Market 플랫폼 기능에 할당되고, 광고주와 블로거를위한 새로운 도구에 익숙해지도록 프로세스를 단순화 합니다.

tokenDistribution.sectionDescription: Social Media 토큰 (SMT)은 ERC20 호환 토큰으로 발행됩니다. 토큰의 총 발행량에 따라 15%가 플랫폼의 코어 기능과 팀에 할당되고, 파트너 및 어드바이저에게 5%가 할당되어 6개월의 권리 확정 기간을 가집니다. 이 모든 것이 총 SMT 발행량을 이룹니다.

tokenSale.contributionMethodsValue: ETH, BTC, XRP, BCH, DASH, DOGE, ETC, NEO, XMR, ZEC

footer.title: Social Media 토큰의 5% 획득
footer.subtitle: 당신의 추천 링크로 결제가 될 때마다

questions.title: What socialmedia.market is?
questions.content:
SocialMedia.Market is the first decentralized marketplace connecting social media bloggers and advertisers. Solving major influencer marketing problems it will create new opportunities for content monetization, community engagement and audience exposure. New ecosystem, driven by blockchain technology and Social Media token, will simplify marketing interaction between business and influencers.
SocialMedia.Market aims to connect publishers and advertisers on a single platform. The project will leverage the Ethereum blockchain in order to create a decentralized ecosystem that will discover, create, perform and analyze advertising campaigns with social media influencers across any social media platform. The blockchain technology will allow the creation of a public and agile platform with an advertising marketplace accessible to everyone, even to up-and-coming influencers, startups and small businesses.

questions.title: Who stands behind of SocialMedia.Market? Does the team have enought experience for such big project?
questions.content: The team behind SocialMedia.Market has years of expertise in entertainment, marketing, analysis and product development. Being one of the biggest private game retailers we have sold over 10 million of games in the past 3 years. We have also created a popular marketplace for virtual items — CSGO.CASH. It has almost a million active esports players monthly selling their in-game items. Games and Esports industries were the first to discover enormous potential of influencer marketing. Therefore, we were among the early adopters of the strategy, learning by hand all the drawbacks and problems of influencer marketing. We have unique insights of how the industry operates and how to make everything simpler and better. Check our team on our Linkedin —  https://www.linkedin.com/company/27058258/.

questions.title: How does platform work? What problems does SocialMedia.Market actually solve? Why it’s needed?
questions.content:
Reaching the target audience is tricky, nowadays. Recent research shows that 47% of overall mobile and desktop internet users are now using ad-blocking software. This number has almost doubled in comparison to the previous year. Furthermore, 36% of traffic generated by Pay-per-click (PPC) campaigns are suspected to be fraudulent or non-human. Hence, brands are seeking new ways of advertising their products and services, discovering the power and realizing the importance of Influencer Marketing.

Social media platforms like YouTube, Facebook, Instagram and Twitter have seen explosive growth, connecting over 3.03 billion people every day. As the amount of time spent online rises globally, consumer behavior changes. Advertising campaigns continue to shift from traditional to digital marketing, and consequently, offline marketing isn’t as effective as it used to be. However, not all digital marketing strategies are effective in reaching consumers. In the past few years companies and agencies have discovered Influencer Marketing as the strategy with the most potential and return, with over 80% of them finding this strategy effective.

Still, Influencer Marketing remains a complicated process for both advertisers building their campaigns and influencers seeking a way to monetize their content. Obscure and uncertain price determination, insecure transactions, non-compliance with executed agreements, fraud, lack of control and unreliable analytic instruments create challenging ROI determination. This imbalance gives the major advertising assets to digital marketing agencies and top social media celebrities.

With our core team know-how and expertise in entertainment, marketing, analysis and product development, we have a clear vision of how to implement Blockchain and Smart Contract technology in a day-to-day solution that will resolve market needs and help develop them, exponentially.

Blockchain technology will simplify the integration between advertisers and publishers and decrease costs for all engaged parties. SocialMedia.Market creates a completely safe and transparent ecosystem for everyone involved in influencer marketing, opening up the opportunities for brands and influencers across the globe to reach their targeted audience of get rewarded for engaging their consumers with the content they enjoy. We will help elevate advertising markets to the next level and take considerable market share very quickly as cryptocurrency and Blockchain technology become mainstream in the next few years.

questions.title: What is the difference between SocialMedia.Market and others?
questions.content:
SocialMedia.Market has significant points and features in comparison with currently existing tools Brands and Influencers have to leverage in the engagement process. Here are SocialMedia.Market’s competitive advantages:

Here is a list of advantages SocialMedia.Market will provide to all parties as a service:

- Transparent and competitive marketplace;
- Reduced operational costs and fees when working with Influencer campaigns;
- Accessible and easy-to-use, even for small businesses and influencers in the early stage of social presence;
- Reducing time and resources being spent on influencer marketing campaigns;
- Smart partnership for a wide range of users with the ability to create smart contracts tailored to specific needs using templates and smart tips;
- Free analytical tools and campaign reports. Multiple custom reports, personalized dashboards and Big Data analytics for token holders;
- Fair dispute solution based on decentralised Blockchain technology;
- Ultimate results, smart planning with Real-Time Analytics and Data Science;
- Global outreach allows project to aim for larger market share, higher diversity and less dependency on local regulations;
- Low commission and option to create campaigns on barter basis gives new opportunities for small companies;
- Influencer’s channel size irrelevant when most influencers online marketplaces only work with bloggers that have more than 10K subscribers;
- Wide range of social media channels for influencing campaigns (Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, Instagram, G+, Snapchat, WeChat, Telegram, Twitch, Blogs);
- Simple automatic account already connected with influencer’s account verification for Influencers.

questions.title: How to participate in SocialMedia.Market token sale?
questions.content:
Presale will start on the 2nd and end on the 9th of February. During presale contributes will be able to purchase Social Media tokens with 20% bonus. Minimal contibution is 25 ETH.

The main ICO will start on February 9, 2018, 12:00 PM GMT (1:00 pm CET). The token sale will end on March 16, 2018, 12:00 PM GMT (1:00 pm CET) or as soon as we reach the hard cap.

Our hard cap: 16 000 ETH (MAX. 58 000 000 SMT). We also provide bonuses during our ICO: Days 1–5: 15%, days 6: 10%, days 21–35: 5%.To participate in SocialMedia.Market token sale you should sign up to your personal account on our website and buy Social Media Tokens. You can make a payment by transferring funds from any BTC, ETH, LTC, or DASH wallet.

We ensure superior security for all investors during the main phase of the SocialMedia.Market token sale. You can check the smart-contract details on the GitHub. Follow the link to learn more: https://github.com/SocialMediaMarket/SocialMediaMarket_token_smart_contract.

questions.title: How to buy Social Media token?
questions.content:
To buy SMT you need to sign up on SocialMedia.Market.After registration, you will need to confirm your email address by following the link in confirmation letter. After registration, you will be redirected to personal account. There you can find all the necessary information for buying Social Media Tokens, such as:

- See your balance of tokens;
- Your referral tokens;
- Transaction history;
- Calculate contribution rate in all cryptocurrencies.
- Your personal data (name, e-mail, ETH-wallet);
- Token contract;

Additional security: 2-Step Verification

We care about your security, so we added a two-step authentication in order to protect SMTs you bought. You can use any convenient application (like Google Authenticator) to generate verification codes. We encourage you to enable 2-step verification in your Personal account ASAP.

After all the setups you can buy our tokens by clicking "Buy" button. All fees charged by financial institutions in connection with wire transfers are paid by the prospective token holders.

When paying in BTC, ETH, LTC, or DASH, transaction fee is charged by the relevant blockchain infrastructure. You set the transaction fee amount, and the transaction speed is determined by the network availability and the fee amount you set. Please read more about the transactions in the currency you’re going to use in order to avoid confusion and complications, before participating in the ICO.

questions.title: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.content:
During our token sale, users can make a payment by transferring funds from any BTC, ETH, LTC, or DASH wallet. All your funds will be credited to your personal account in our system. Then from your personal account, you can purchase our Social Media tokens.

For your convenience we added new payment methods. You can buy our tokens with 12 popular cryptocurrencies: ETH, BTC, TLC, Ripple, Bitcoin Cash, Dash, Dogecoin, Ether Classic, NEO, Nexus, Monero and ZCash.NOTE!

Regardless of the currency you choose for contribution you need to have the Ethereum wallet address (Master Wallet) in order to receive SMT.

questions.title: How long does it take for the payment to arrive?
questions.content:
Transaction fees will be charged by the relevant blockchain system. The transaction speed is defined by the network availability and fees, you set up before.

The funds will appear in your account wallets only after your cryptocurrency transaction gets 6 confirmations. You will receive an email about the successful deposit.

questions.title: How to create an ethereum wallet?
questions.content:
Here is a short guide on how to create a wallet in MyEtherWallet. The process for other wallets is similar.

STEP 1. Visit MyEtherWallet, enter a strong password and generate a wallet.

STEP 2. Now you need to store your Private Key. There are 3 ways to do this.

Download a .JSON file with an encrypted version of the private key. It is compatible with geth, mist and myetherwallet. Also it requires a password to decrypt (Keystore).

Store unencrypted version of your private key by downloading it in a .JSON file.

Copy paste a .JSON file from the website.

To get an additional level of security for your wallet you can use the Keystore (encrypted) feature.

STEP 3. Make sure to save your wallet address or the QR code. You have to give a sender a public key in order to receive transactions. You can copy the text format or the QR Code. Your QR code can also be used to create a paper wallet.

Also you can check our video:

questions.title: What are min/max purchases?
questions.content:
During Presale (2–9 of February 2018)minimal contribution amount is 25 ETH.

During our ICO (9 February — 16 March 2018) minimum contribution amount is 0,1 ETH / 250 SMTs. Maximum contribution amount is 300 ETH.

Token exchange rate: 1 ETH = 2500 SMTs

questions.title: Why do you not accept credit/debit card payment option?
questions.content: We declined this payment option for security reasons. You can buy our tokens by Bitcoin, ETH or any other cryptocurrency available on our platform.

questions.title: Where to buy cryptocurrency (Bitcoins or Ethers)?
questions.content:
You can buy Bitcoin on:

- www.coinmama.com (card payment);

- cryptocoincharts.info (card payment);

- cex.io (card payment);

- localbitcoins.net (cash and bank transfer);

- www.coinbase.com (bank transfer at any popular exchange).

You can buy Ethers on:

- cex.io (card payment);

- www.coinmama.com (card payment);

- www.coinbase.com (bank transfer at any popular exchange).

questions.title: How to get money back after deposition funds into personal account? I didn’t buy Social Media tokens.
questions.content: Please email our support@socialmedia.market. Specify the email through you sign up on our website, the cryptocurrency type and wallet you want to get refund. We will refund your money within 3 business days (minus operational expences).

questions.title: How to get money back after deposition funds into personal account? I’ve already bought Social Media tokens.
questions.content: We can refund your money only before you buy tokens. All sales are final.

questions.title: When will your ICO start?
questions.content:
Presale will start on the 2nd and end on the 9th of February. During presale contributes will be able to purchase Social Media tokens with 20% bonus.

The second phase of the public token sale will start on February 9, 2018, 12:00 PM GMT (1:00 pm CET). The token sale will end on March 16, 2018, 12:00 PM GMT (1:00 pm CET) or as soon as we reach the hard cap. We also provide bonuses during public sale: Days 1–5: 15%, days 6: 10%, days 21–35: 5%.

questions.title: What is total supply of token SMT?
questions.content:
The hard cap of our ICO is 16 000 ETH. The token exchange rate is 2500 SMTs for 1 ETH.

The funds raised through the token sale campaign will be allocated for all SocialMedia.Market platform features available for all ecosystem participants, as well as strong marketing support for fast growth in the number of the platform users, and simplification of the process of getting used to the new tools for advertisers and bloggers.

The marketing budget in the amount of 38% of the raised during the token sale is going to be distributed to the general international advertising campaign of the platform. Besides, the part of the budget will be forwarded to the development of regional offices and marketing campaigns.37% — for research & development;

38% — marketing & education campaigns;

12% — administrative & operational;

8% —  influencers & agencies bonuses.

Read more about allocation of tokens in our White Paper, section 6 “Development and ecosystem expansion plan”.

questions.title: Will you have any discounts/bonuses?
questions.content:
During pre-sale contributes will be able to purchase Social Media tokens with 20% bonus. Presale will start on 2 and end on the 9th of February, with the start of main ICO. Minimal contribution — 25 ETH.

We also provide bonuses during public sale: Days 1–5: 15%, days 6: 10%, days 21–35: 5%. You can also join our Referral program.

questions.title: How to join your referral program?
questions.content:
To become part of our Referral Program please sign up on our official website —  https://ico.socialmedia.market. Then you need to share your referral link with friends or followers. If any of them signs up with this link they will be added as your referral. You will get a 5% reward from all Social Media Tokens purchased by your referrals. Your referrals will also get a 3% bonus to the tokens they buy.

Regardless of cryptocurrency used for investments into our platform, all bonuses for participants of referral program are delivered in Social Media Tokens. All bonus tokens will be credited to your account after the referral’s transaction. Bonus coins will be available for withdrawal after the end of the token sale.

questions.title: How to get a referral link?
questions.content:
To become part of our Referral Program please sign up on our official website — https://ico.socialmedia.market.

Then you will get access to your personal account where you can find your unique referral link.

questions.title: Where to publish a referral link?
questions.content:
Distribute your referral link on your website, social profiles, forums, telegram groups, youtube channels or any other platform.

We don’t recommend you to spam your referral link, as catchy content will attract more attention. You can use this example to post on your profiles: “Сheers! I’ve stumbled upon SocialMedia.Market ICO, a decentralized marketplace for social media bloggers and advertisers. This project creates opportunities for content monetization, community engagement, and audience exposure. Their token sale will start on February 9, 2018. Also they have a neet Referral Program! So, if you want to buy some Social Media Tokens, follow my referral link, sign up and get 3% bonus!”

The SocialMedia.Market referral program will be launched on January, 10 and will remain active up to the end of the second phase of the token sale. Don’t miss the opportunity to become a part of the next generation of online advertising and earn extra SMTs!

If you’re an experienced referral manager, or have questions about our referral program, don’t hesitate to email our BDM — viktor@socialmedia.market.

questions.title: Is there any way I can quickly check the number of my referrals?
questions.content: You can check this info on your personal account. Click the “My account” button in the menu and then click on “Profile”. On this page you’ll find the table where all your referrals are indicated.

questions.title: Do you have a bounty campaign?
questions.content: Yes, we are running a bounty campaign. Follow the link to check the details — https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=2321059.0

questions.title: How the token can be used?
questions.content:
The Social Media Token will create a self-driven economy, based on constant cooperation between influencers, advertisers, marketing agencies and agents. The token will be valuable for platform users, not only by transactional means within the platform’s services, but also supported with exclusive features for token holders.

A user can utilize the following methods to operate the tokens:

- An integrated wallet on the platform’s account;

Import their Ethereum wallet containing SMT tokens with private key;

Link an ERC20-compatible MetaMask wallet to the account.

Token holders will also have exclusive access to premium platform services. Holding a certain amount of tokens on their accounts will grant them access to deep analytical data, exclusive insights to audience outreach of bloggers they are willing to cooperate with, special advertising formats, content development tools for bloggers, channel audience growth strategies and campaigns, exclusive advertising contracts with well-known brands and marketing consultations.

Participation in the decentralized dispute solution system will not only support proper advertising campaigns execution and grant equal rights to every user, it will guide platform development. Voting for such resolutions will bring rewards to token holders for active personal participating. To participate in voting, user must maintain a certain amount of tokens on his balance on a constant basis.

Moreover, token holders may perform dedicated marketing services for platform users and include their service fee to every executed smart contract from campaign they have helped to create.

questions.title: Is there a KYC requirement?
questions.content:
A KYC-system will be accessible with the beginning of the ICO (February 9). By that time you will receive an email with all the instructions. Note that you may participate in our presale and go through the KYC procedure later, but you will not be able to withdraw tokens. KYC is implemented to identify the identity and location of the token holder.

After passing KYC on our website, you will be registered under ICOSID and will be able to pass KYC of another ICOs supporting this ID without providing documents. If you have registered and verified еру ICOs ID, you don’t need to pass KYC additionally in your personal account.

Tokens will be issued and credited to users only after the token sale is completed and the KYC procedure is completed. The procedure for document verification will be automatic.

Users will be required to provide:
- identity documents (passport, driving license or national ID card);
- documents confirming the residence.

We will notify you later which documents will be required for the confirmation.

questions.title: What is SocialMedia.Market?
questions.content: Socialmedia.market is the first decentralized ecosystem to discover, create, run, and analyze advertising campaigns with social media influencers. Based on the blockchain technology it will bring marketing activities between brands and social media bloggers to a whole new level of transparency, safety, and interaction.

questions.title: What features the platform will have?
questions.content:
SocialMedia.Market will have features and benefits for all market participants (brands, advertisers, agencies and influencers).

A short list of features SocialMedia.Market will provide to all parties as a service:

- Transparent and competitive marketplace;

- Greatly reduced operational costs and fees when working with Influencer campaigns;

- Accessible and easy-to-use, even for small businesses and influencers in the early stage of social presence;

- Smart partnership for a wide range of users with the ability to create smart contracts tailored to specific needs using templates and smart tips;

- Fair dispute solution based on decentralised Blockchain technology Ultimate results, smart planning with Real-Time Analytics and Data Science;

- Global outreach allows project to aim for larger market share, higher diversity and less dependency on local regulations.

questions.title: What is SMT token?
questions.content: Social Media Token (SMT) is the internal currency of the platform. SMT will ensure transactions, data validity, campaign and contract creation.

questions.title: Why are you issuing your own cryptocurrency?
questions.content:
Blockchain and smart contract technologies allow to implement escrow and automate contracting, as well as provide instant worldwide payments. It also allows us to decentralize disputes between users. If parties for any reason have an argument which they can’t negotiate together, they call for experts to decide who’s right. Any user who has a good rating and holds SMTs on account can become an expert to take part in dispute resolution.

We are here to build a platform that will help to establish secure, transparent, and beneficial connections for businesses and influencers. Blockchain and smart contract technologies are the key here to many of the industry challenges. It will allow to shift the culture toward the openness and reliability of professional communication and operations. The solution to the influencer marketing issues is a transparent ecosystem. And the blockchain technology provides a way to create it.

SMT is designed to be the flagship currency of SocialMedia.Market ecosystem, facilitating fund transfers between business, influencers or agents.

questions.title: How does the SocialMedia.Market platform work? What problems does SocialMedia.Market actually solve? Why it’s needed?
questions.content:
The SocialMedia.Market platform automates all business processes related to selection, creation and management of the influencer’s marketing activities, including the distribution of financial means among the participants.

The platform has a friendly and easy-to-use interface for brands and influencers to help post and accept tasks easily. To ensure the authenticity of the users, the platform will perform identity verifications whenever is necessary. The unique identities of advertiser and influencers will be based on their addresses in the Blockchain, making it difficult to forge. In order to protect personal data on the account of advertiser and influencer, two-factor authentication can be applied.

questions.title: How do I profit as member of SocialMedia.Market team?
questions.content:
Influencer Marketing — is the most fast growing sector of online advertising that will turn into a $5–10 billion industry by the end of 2020. Influencer Marketing is the most cost-effective advertising channel with 1069% ROI.

SocialMedia.Market solves all major issues, that interfere with a hype growth of Influencer Marketing. Our platform will stimilate market growth even further by allowing a vast majority of micro-influencers and small businesses to be involved into influencer marketing campaigns. Token holders can earn additional tokens and increase token value, participating in a decentralized dispute solution.

SocialMedia.Market sells 80% of all its tokens to eliminate the possibility of market control and manipulation.

NOTICE: USA, Chine and Singapore citizens will not be able to participate in the pre-ICO, but will be able to participate in the main token sale (from the 9th of February to the 16th of March). More detailed information will be announced soon. You may double check the full list of banned countries in the token sale policy by the link below —  https://socialmedia.market/assets/pdf/SMM_TOS_eng.pdf
